mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_profile (user_id, preferred_tags, price_min, price_max, preferred_districts) VALUES (#{userId}, #{preferredTags}, #{priceMin}, #{priceMax}, #{preferredDistricts}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE preferred_tags = VALUES(preferred_tags), price_min = VALUES(price_min), price_max = VALUES(price_max), preferred_districts = VALUES(preferred_districts)
